document_data.name: Daggers of Truth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Daggers of Truth''' was a group of [[adventurer]]s who followed the teachings of [[Sharess]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The adventuring band was active in [[Mulhorand]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Daggers of Truth worked to thwart the plans of [[Set]] and his agents in Mulhorand. They received support from followers of [[Anhur]] and [[Horus-Re]] in their ventures.
